description: Expected edit suggestion structure for copywriting skills testing

validation_rules.no_file_modification: Skills must never write to files, only output suggestions
validation_rules.rationale_required: Every suggestion must include specific rationale
validation_rules.before_exact_match: Before content must exactly match source
validation_rules.technical_preservation: Technical sections (code, benchmarks) should rarely be edited
validation_rules.section_classification: All sections must be classified by type
validation_rules.suggestion_limit: Typically 5-10 suggestions per document for high-impact changes only

ameno_voice.constraints: No metaphor abuse, preserve direct introductions

validate: Each produces different suggestions for same section

test_already_optimized.input: Edge Case: Already Optimized Content section
test_already_optimized.expected: Minimal or no suggestions - content already strong

test_minimal_content.expected: No suggestions or acknowledgment that content is too brief

test_pure_technical.input: Edge Case: Pure Technical Definition section

validate: All focus on high-impact changes only

anti_patterns_to_detect.file_writing: Skill should never call Write or Edit tools
anti_patterns_to_detect.vague_rationale: Rationale like 'makes it better' without specifics
anti_patterns_to_detect.excessive_edits: More than 10 suggestions indicates lack of selectivity
anti_patterns_to_detect.technical_modification: Edits to code blocks or benchmarks without compelling reason
anti_patterns_to_detect.missing_preserved_section: Should acknowledge sections intentionally not edited
